backend/main.mo: Actor canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and user-owned model registry with metadata, storage hooks, and query/update endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions establishing the app's custom emerald/amber theme for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing authentication state, navigation, and page rendering with theme support.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Guard component that blocks access to protected content until the user signs in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting a first-time authenticated user to create a profile by submitting their name.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the caller's user profile using the actor, handling loading states tied to identity readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication via context, managing login state, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching models, updating metadata, deleting models, and saving user profiles through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers plus custom light/dark theme variables for the appâ€™s design system.
frontend/src/lib/costEstimator.ts: Utilities for estimating ICP cycles costs based on model size, request volume, and compute time.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CostEstimatorPage.tsx: UI page allowing users to adjust model parameters and view estimated cycles and ICP costs.
frontend/src/pages/InferencePage.tsx: UI for selecting a model, submitting input, and running a simulated inference workflow with mock results.
frontend/src/pages/LimitationsPage.tsx: Renders a page explaining IC platform constraints and feasible AI model types using cards, alerts, and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ModelManagementPage.t: Provides an authenticated interface for users to upload, list, update, and delete their AI model artifacts with size validation and status feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings using custom theme variables and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, features, requirements, and active requests for the ICP AI model hosting app.
